name: Block Balance (saddest_potatoes)
description:
The game was made in just 3 hours for Trijam #204.

It has some bugs and weird stuff that I'll *maybe* fix later 😂

HOW TO PLAY:

Don't drop your blocks or let your blocks get too high.

The height resets every few blocks so always make sure you have space to drop a new block.

Honestly, I thought a game like this would take way less time to complete and without any errors😂

Here I am with maybe the worse code I've ever written for a game😂 and maybe spending too much time on things that I shouldn't be doing😂

But I've wanted to do this challenge for so long so I'm glad I finally did.

Maybe next time will be way better.

Thanks for coming to my ted talk enjoy the game😂
